Title: De draken van Bruce Lee
sinopsis: Una mujer fatal experta en artes marciales da una lección a la mafia.

Title: Fontamara

sinopsis: Lee Han-sun recibe el encargo de transportar una lista de nombres mientras es perseguido por el ejército japonés,

Title: Rece do góry
sinopsis: Un entrenador de caballos de clase baja irrumpe en el aristocrático mundo de las carreras de pura sangre.

Title: Firecracker
sinopsis: Drama teatral influido por el poema medieval portugués del mismo nombre, en que se describe una isla paradisiaca como tierra prometida por la Diosa Venus para los soldados lusitanos.

Title: Seis pasajes al infierno
sinopsis: Unemployed professor, Fernando is sustained by his factory worker girlfriend Rita. One day they go out to an afternoon picnic with a couple of friends, sexist and reactionary Luís Carlos and inexperienced Lilita.

Title: The Stowaway
sinopsis: The Purple Jade Badger: is what all martial artists seek, a magical elixir that will transform the drinker into an all-powerful kung-fu master! The Flying Fox comes seeking the murderer of his wife, but becomes ensnared in the machinations of the sects and rogue masters who seek the Purple Jade Badger for their own purposes.

Title: Jie quan da dong kau
sinopsis: Un joven, acosado por un general psicópata, aprende artes marciales en el templo Shaolin para vengar la muerte de su padre.

Title: A Ilha dos Amores
sinopsis: La relación entre dos amigos del extrarradio de Madrid. Cuando uno de ellos deja embarazada a la hermana del otro, tienen que encontrar la manera de pagar un aborto para evitar un conflicto con sus padres.

Title: Amor, palavra prostituta
sinopsis: Set in 1943 Scotland during World War II, Janie is a young housewife married to a man named Dougal, 15 years her senior. As part of a war rehabilitation program, Janie and Dougal welcome three Italian P.O.W.'s to work on their farm and Janie soon falls in love and enters into a doomed affair with one of the Italians named Luigi.

Title: Le rose et le blanc
sinopsis: Exiled Chilean director Patricio Guzmán filmed in Cuba and in Venezuela to create this controversial statement on the creation and survival of Latin American culture from the late-15th century to the present. For some viewers, the film will be superficially symbolic and rhetorical, for others, it will be a strong and personal vision of several centuries of history.

Title: Han shan fei hu
sinopsis: An aristocratic Sicilian family living in the 1950s. Count Villafratti has sex one night with his nymphomaniac daughter because he thinks she is his wife.

sinopsis: La historia de un sencillo montañés, Guaguasi, que se enamora de una bella corista, Marina, durante la Revolución Cubana. Guaguasi se une a los rebeldes y llega a La Habana al final de la dictadura de Batista.

Title: Cecilia
sinopsis: Theresa (Yasmine Bleeth) is an imaginative, rebellious orphan from Brooklyn, who has dreams of show business success. She tries outrageous schemes to launch herself into the public eye, until finally meeting mentor, Sammy Cohen (Buddy Hackett), whose own career fizzled as a result of alcoholism. Official Selection Toronto and AFI Film Fest.

Title: Colegas
sinopsis: Tommy Chen wants to become a professional drummer. Because of his loud practice sessions at home he gets into trouble with the neighbors and his father. But especially his grandpa and his friends support his ambitions.

Title: Another Time, Another Place
sinopsis: The dramatic story of Jan Amos Comenius, a 17th century Christian hero and a testimony of the persistence of Christian courage.

Title: Guaguasi
sinopsis: La historia real de un caballo secuestrado en Italia y la búsqueda de una joven para recuperarlo.

Title: Putování Jana Amose
sinopsis: Una joven regresa a su tierra natal, solo para descubrir que los horrores de los que logró escapar también la han infectado.

Title: Bástyasétány hetvennégy

Title: The Dream Chasers

Title: Meri Jung
sinopsis: A sultry French boarding school for girls, in the early twenties. The young pupil Lucienne evades but returns with a weird police inspector who should protect her. Against what or whom? Solange, the psychic unstable gym teacher? Or the voyeuristic principal Madame de Challens? Or other girls?

Title: Amada
sinopsis: Jan Bard is a Polish intellectual and writer, who decides to stay in West Berlin and publish a new novel there. Things get complicated when he falls for his publisher's wife.

sinopsis: Dos hermosas mujeres parecidas, una de la alta sociedad y la otra una prostituta de lujo, cambian de lugar para vivir nuevas experiencias.

sinopsis: Witek persigue a un tren. Se siguen tres variaciones de cómo un incidente tan aparentemente banal podría influir el resto de su vida.

Title: 1000-nen kizami no hidokei
sinopsis: Tonia goes out drinking. She wakes up in prison, not having a clue why she's there. She is tortured to encourage her to confess to a crime she is not aware of.

Title: Contra la pared

Title: Lo que vendrá

Title: Tolko tri nochi

Title: Chasing Dreams
sinopsis: Li y Al, que llevan poco tiempo casados, quieren divorciarse. Se sienten atrapados en su matrimonio y en su apartamento de una sola habitación. Anhelan una vida poco convencional y con sentido, pero la búsqueda de éste les confunde.

Title: Przesluchanie
sinopsis: Adam receives a flashlight with special powers: every liar it shines on flies into the air. Production was canceled in 1965 due to the film's political content. Only in 1989-1990 could the director reconstruct the film, replacing missing sounds and images with script inserts.

Title: Champagne amer

Title: Joshilaay
sinopsis: Jo conoce a un misterioso marchante de arte que compra algunos de sus dibujos y le encarga que haga más. Pide ayuda a unos amigos y parte hacia Ámsterdam para buscar al hombre misterioso.

Title: The Humpty Dumpty Man
sinopsis: Noura struggles to reconcile two worlds, Muslim women and men, while also dealing with his own sexuality.

Title: Wenn du groß bist, lieber Adam
Vojtech, receny sirotek
sinopsis: It's the last night at the Paradise Inn, a sixty year-old Chinatown bar in Honolulu closing its doors in the wake of urban renewal. Title: Spy Story

Title: Asfour Stah

Title: Nonstop

Title: Committed

Title: Open House
sinopsis: Bruno, a novelist without luck, responds to the distress call of his love, Sofía, who finds herself in desolate Veracruz and doesn't know what to do with the corpse of her boyfriend. Bruno proposes to Sofía to get rid of the corpse.

Title: La nuit de l'océan
sinopsis: Un niño rico, solitario y emocionalmente abandonado, se encariña con uno de los hombres que lo secuestran durante un robo frustrado de la caja fuerte de su padre.

Title: Tao xue wai zhuan
